translation: Th byyhi rạcz hund yylhi so skvunh san ṭạry chhe spdan,
(ae nby) tuhndụ̄ rbn chihnv nh tvhụ̄ hrgz trạvimtụ̄ th nah spud suh naraẓ.
Th pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ chuh tuhndi khạṭr ptim davr goddnkhi dvr khoth bhtr.
Th ʿnqryb diyih tuhund rb tohyih tyvutah zi tvhụ̄ gczihv khosh.
Kya tmụ̄ lbnavna tvhụ̄ ytym th pth kvrnv ttihkanh frahm?
Th vathi nishhi lbinav navạqf th pth bkhshnv hdayt.
Th tvhụ̄ lbinav nadar th pth bnạvinv maldar.
Th pnnis rb sndi nʿmtuk kriv aẓhar.
